10.5px,12.5px,10.5px:
{
  "bounds": [800, 600],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "position": [11, 0],
          "bounds": [100, 50],
          "drawsContent": true,
          "repaintRects": [
            [12, 0, 12, 12],
            [10, 0, 12, 12]
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
10.6px,12.4px,10.4px:
{
  "bounds": [800, 600],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "position": [11, 0],
          "bounds": [100, 50],
          "drawsContent": true,
          "repaintRects": [
            [11, 0, 13, 12],
            [9, 0, 13, 12]
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
